author: @DoYouRemember
title: Employee Discovers Rare Coin Worth Up To $11,400
text: Recently, a Wawa convenience store staff member came across a rare coin while on duty. To know more about the lucky find, the employee took to Reddit to share details about it, and this sparked the interest of [coin](https://doyouremember.com/178150/coin-collector-reveals-how-identify-valuable-lincoln-penny) collectors and enthusiasts. In the post, the employee revealed that they found the coin while sorting through [a roll of coins](https://l.smartnews.com/p-tfzb4/pVieBb) in the store’s cash register. The penny, which is over a century old, appeared darker than usual and had a unique design that featured a Native American head. The rare coin could be worth a fortune [@thecoinchannel]100+ year old coin found in a penny roll at work. [#coinroll] [#valuablecoins] [#penny] [#coin] [#foryou] [♬ Mysterious and sad BGM(1120058) – S and N] Coin collectors and enthusiasts in the comment section of the post identified the coin to be penny minted in 1902, showcasing a design long discontinued production. A Redditor, Eric Miller, who is a coin evaluator, offered insight into its potential value. RELATED: [Coin Collector Lists Five Coins Worth More Than $10,000 And Up To $373,750](https://doyouremember.com/178202/five-coins-worth-more-than-10000-up-to-373750?utm_source=web&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=related) He emphasized that the year of minting can greatly affect the worth of a coin. Drawing comparisons, Miller pointed out that high-quality Indian head pennies from 1877 have fetched prices as high as $6,000. This suggests that the 1904 penny could potentially be worth even more, with a precedent set by a high-quality specimen selling for $11,400 in January 2021, as reported by the Professional Coin Grading Service. Miller has gained a wide following for sharing interesting details about coins on TikTok. The coin collector also pointed out a new detail in his recent post where he claimed a coin was projected to be worth over 30,000 times its normal worth due to a production error. Although Miller didn’t mention the name or the year the coin was produced, he explained that the coin featured Abraham Lincoln and that the error was located on his ear.

author: Rachel Kiley
title: Study offers new hope for same-sex couples who want kids with their shared DNA
text:
Family
Study offers new hope for same-sex couples who want kids with their shared DNA
Study offers new hope for same-sex couples who want kids with their shared DNA
Scientists are making progress with a technique that could make this possible.
Same-sex couples looking to start a family already
have options available to them, but science might just be paving the way for one that allows both parents to be genetically related to their child.
OK this is about to get a bit technical, but stay with us here.
Science Advances recently
published a study by Oregon Health & Science University into a technique called in vitro gametogenesis (IVG). Specifically, OHSU has been focused on replacing the nucleus of an existing egg with the nucleus of a genetically different skin cell, then removing half the chromosomes to allow it to be fertilized by sperm cells.
Currently, they have been experimenting with mice, but the end goal here is to be able to combine chromosomes from two people — one using skin cells and one using sperm cells — to produce viable embryos.
Although IVG is something the scientific community has been researching for some time now, according to an OHSU News press release, “the new study goes further by meticulously sequencing the chromosomes.”
“In the next phase of this research, we will determine how we enhance that pairing so each chromosome pair separates correctly,”
said senior author Shoukhrat Mitalipov, Ph.D.
The authors of the study stressed that the technique is still a long way from potentially being viable for human use, but it’s something both infertile couples and
LGBTQ+ couples hoping to have biological children have kept an eye on as the research has continued. And even though the OHSU study specifically focuses on using skin cells for the egg, other research is going into using various cells to create sperm, as well.
As potentially exciting as it is, it does raise a number of ethical questions and concerns about how this sort of advancement could ultimately reshape aspects of society and parenthood.
An article published by
NPR last year features conversations about IVG replacing adoption, solo IVG (where a child is genetically only related to a single parent), and using cells from children, dead people, or even unaware celebrities to create an embryo. It also suggests this could contribute to the concern over designer babies being a thing of the future.
But while there may be larger implications at play, should this ever come to fruition, the idea of a world where the effective differences between same-sex couples and and opposite-sex couples shrink in and of itself does sound kind of nice.

author: Nathan Langley
title: Historic Egyptian Theatre calls for community volunteers | News | wrex.com
text: DEKALB, Ill. — A local theatre listed on the [U.S. National Register of Historic Places](https://www.nps.gov/subjects/nationalregister/index.htm) looks to recruit volunteers for the new year. The [Egyptian Theatre](https://egyptiantheatre.org/) in downtown DeKalb welcomes those dedicated to making a difference through volunteering. Likewise, with the call for help, the nonprofit theatre encourages those interested to attend training sessions. In its Friday announcement, the [Egyptian](https://www.facebook.com/dekalbegyptiantheatre/) acknowledged the "opportunity" volunteers possess to give back to the community. "Upcoming training sessions [are] designed to familiarize potential volunteers with the various opportunities available at the historic nonprofit theatre," states the Egyptian Theatre. Training sessions will be held on the following date and times: Wednesday, January 10th, at 6 p.m. Wednesday, January 24th, at 6 p.m. Wednesday, February 7th, at 6 p.m. The theatre states no RSVP or registration is required to attend the "informative sessions." Moreover, each training lasts for an hour as volunteers "delve into the diverse tasks and responsibilities volunteers undertake at the Egyptian Theatre. By the sessions end, the Egyptian hopes "attendees leave fully prepared to contribute meaningfully to the Theatre’s mission." Those interested can direct questions to [volunteer@egyptiantheatre.org](mailto:volunteer@egyptiantheatre.org). Likewise, the historic event space is located at 135 N. 2nd St., DeKalb.

author: @KOLO8
title: Lahontan Reservoir upgraded to a Harmful Algae Bloom Warning Advisory
text:
Lahontan Reservoir upgraded to a Harmful Algae Bloom Warning Advisory
Published: Jul. 2, 2025 at 8:52 PM PDT|Updated: 1 hour ago
RENO, Nev. (KOLO) - The Lahontan Reservoir’s condition has deteriorated from an an active Harmful Algae Bloom (HAB) Watch Advisory to a Warning Advisory, according to a Nevada State Parks website update on July 1.
“Swim at your own risk,” the update warned.
Visual and satellite imagery assessments show an increase in Cyanobacteria, the update said.
The Nevada Division of Environmental Protection is testing the water.
Toxic algae can cause serious health issues for people and animals.
For previous KOLO-TV 8 coverage, click here.

author: Ximena Ochoa
title: Estrategia de seguridad: Detuvieron a un hombre con más de 4 kilos de fentanilo en Sonora
text:
Detuvieron a un hombre con más de 4 kilos de fentanilo en Sonora García Harfuch informó que la detención en Sonora se dio en conjunto con Defensa y Marina; además que es parte de los esfuerzos de la lucha contra el fentanilo. 09 abril 2025 15:40hrs 2 minutos de lectura. Compartir: Compartir
Facebook
X
Whatsapp
Telegram Copiar Enlace Enlace Copiado
URL Escrito por: Ximena Ochoa Secretaría de Seguridad El secretario de Seguridad y Protección Ciudadana (SSPC), Omar García Harfuch , informó a través de su cuenta de X, antes Twitter, sobre la detención de un hombre en Sonora que transportaba más de cuatro kilos de fentanilo .
La captura fue resultado de un operativo conjunto entre diversas fuerzas de seguridad, así como en el marco de la lucha contra la fabricación de drogas en el país, especialmente del fentanilo.
adn40 Siempre Conmigo . Suscríbete a nuestro canal de WhatsApp y lleva la información en la palma de tu mano.
La investigación fue encabezada por la nueva Agencia de Investigación Criminal Durante un mensaje este miércoles 9 de abril, García Harfuch detalló que la detención se logró gracias a una investigación encabezada por la Agencia de Investigación Criminal (AIC) de la Fiscalía General de la República (FGR), en coordinación con el Gabinete de Seguridad .
En seguimiento a trabajos de investigación para evitar el tráfico de drogas en Sonora, en una acción encabezada por la #AIC de @FGRMexico , en coordinación con el Gabinete de Seguridad @Defensamx1 , @SEMAR_mx , @GN_MEXICO_ , @SSPCMexico , fue detenido un hombre que transportaba más de… pic.twitter.com/lWw7RNBxbE
— Omar H Garcia Harfuch (@OHarfuch) April 9, 2025 En la operación participaron también elementos de la Secretaría de la Defensa Nacional (Defensa), la Secretaría de Marina (SEMAR), la Guardia Nacional (GN) y la Secretaría de Seguridad y Protección Ciudadana (SSPC).
El sujeto fue detenido en Sonora mientras viajaba en un autobús Según el comunicado oficial , el arresto ocurrió en un punto de inspección ubicado en el kilómetro 33 de la carretera federal 15, en e l tramo Hermosillo-Santa Ana .
Los oficiales de seguridad, que realizaban tareas de vigilancia, observaron un autobús que al percatarse de su presencia intentó evadir el control . Ante esta conducta sospechosa, los efectivos lo interceptaron y solicitaron al conductor descender para realizar una revisión.
El reto de la inseguridad en México: Avances, desafíos y estrategias pendientes
[VIDEO] El combate a la inseguridad sigue siendo una de las mayores preocupaciones en México. Aunque en los últimos seis meses se han decomisado más de 70 laboratorios de fentanilo y los homicidios han bajado un 15% Durante la inspección, se encontraron cuatro paquetes de forma rectangular, envueltos en plástico transparente, que contenían un polvo blanco con características similares al fentanilo , con un peso aproximado de cuatro kilos.
Además, se hallaron cuatro paquetes pequeños con la misma sustancia , sumando aproximadamente 500 gramos adicionales.
El conductor fue detenido, se le informaron sus derechos y fue puesto a disposición del Ministerio Público . La dependencia informó que continuará con las investigaciones para esclarecer los detalles del caso y definir su situación jurídica.
También te puede interesar: Trump promueve campaña antidrogas de México "El fentanilo te mata" con subtítulos en inglés en su red social Trump compartió en Truth Social la campaña mexicana “El fentanilo te mata” con subtítulos en inglés y anunció que planea replicarla en EUA para la actual crisis
Es Tendencia Ver nota
La lucha contra el fentanilo en Sonora Este operativo es parte de los esfuerzos del gobierno mexicano para combatir el tráfico de drogas en el país , especialmente el fentanilo, que ha causado un aumento de casos de intoxicación y muerte en diversas regiones .
Esta estrategia ha aumentado en los estadios del norte del país, especialmente en Sonora y Sinaloa , donde se acrecentaron las investigaciones .
adn40 Siempre Conmigo . Suscríbete a nuestro canal de Telegram y lleva la información en tus manos.
Sonora ¡No te pierdas nuestro contenido, sigue a adn40 en Google News! Autor / Redactor
Ximena Ochoa ximena.ochoa@tvazteca.com.mx

author: Yumna
title: Comment on Baked Feta Pasta by Yumna
text:
This post may contain affiliate links. Please read our
disclosure policy.
For an easy weeknight pasta dish that’s fuss free and flavorful, you have to check out this baked feta pasta with bursting cherry tomatoes. The dish is pretty much hands-off, and all the magic happens in the oven. Made with just a handful of ingredients, it’s no wonder this dish went viral in Finland and is now called Tik Tok Pasta!
I learned about this recipe from my friend
Grilled Cheese Social, who made it based on a viral recipe called #uunifetapasta made famous in Finland by Liemessa and originally shared by Tiiu. It became so popular that the grocery stores ran out of feta cheese!! I had to give it a try and I see what all the rage is about!! And that’s how Tik Tok pasta was born – literally with my viral video!
Baked Feta Pasta Video Tutorial
Ingredients and substitutions
- Tomatoes: Opt for cherry or grape tomatoes for this recipe. Their small size means optimal flavor, and the presentation of the tomatoes when they burst is just stunning.
- Feta Cheese: Use a block of feta cheese for best results. That’s because the block is less processed and will give a more melty consistency when baked.
- Pasta: You can use any pasta you’d like or even make this with gluten-free pasta.
- Seasoning & Herbs: You’ll need olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic and basil. Play around with the seasoning and herbs if you’d like. You can try using some fresh oregano, fresh thyme or switching the fresh garlic for
roasted garlic.
How to make baked feta pasta
- Using a baking dish that’s safe for the oven
like this one, add the tomatoes, olive oil, salt and pepper and mix to combine.
- Add the block of feta cheese to the center of the baking dish, and either flip it around a couple times to coat it with the olive oil and seasoning, or just add a touch more olive oil and a couple cracks of fresh black pepper.
- Bake it in the oven until the tomatoes burst and the feta looks melted (and your house smells heavenly!)
- As soon as it comes out of the oven, add some fresh minced garlic and fresh basil leaves.
- Mix it around immediately so that the garlic softens from the heat in the dish.
- Add cooked pasta on top and give everything a stir. The feta and tomatoes will essentially create a sauce for the pasta.
Tips for making baked feta pasta
- Use the freshest ingredients possible. With such minimal ingredients, I highly recommend using fresh cherry tomatoes (not canned diced tomatoes), fresh basil, and fresh minced garlic. And extra virgin olive oil makes all the difference here – it’s essentially what makes up the sauce!
- Save the pasta water. Whenever I cook pasta, I like to save ½ a cup of pasta water just in case the pasta dish comes out dry. I didn’t use it here, but you can certainly add it if you feel the baked feta pasta needs more sauce. And in general, it will help the sauce be more smooth and creamy.
- Crowd the baking dish with the cherry tomatoes. The rule with roasting cherry tomatoes is if you want them saucy, crowed the pan; if you want them dry roasted, place in a single layer to allow for air circulation. We want saucy here, and I found than an 8″x11″ baking dish works perfectly!
- Increase the heat for blistered tomatoes. You can set the oven to broil for 2 minutes at the end or turn the temperature to 450°F during the last 5 minutes of cooking.
- Try it on the stovetop. You can cook this on the stovetop over medium-low heat like I did in this
Instagram video. It takes only 10 minutes and pretty similar results.
Frequently asked questions
Yes, it will still work with crumbled feta, make sure to keep the feta stacked in the middle so that it creates a melty consistency together.
Yes, I tried it with goat cheese and it creates a creamy perfect texture, but cook time may be less depending on how large the block of cheese is. I’ve also heard success using high quality full fat ricotta.
I have seen this made with penne, spaghetti, bow-tie and the works. I really don’t think there’s a wrong shape of pasta to use. However, I do like something with curves or edges so that the sauce can cling on to more of the pasta.
This pasta is best served straight out of the baking dish. If you have any leftovers, you can keep them in an airtight container in the fridge to enjoy within the next couple days.
There’s something about baked feta and bursting juicy sweet cherry tomatoes that is absolutely irresistible. Add to it some pasta, and this dish is a weeknight dream dinner come true! I’m obsessed with tik tok pasta and I hope you try it and love it too!
More pasta recipes:
One Pan Pasta Cheese Stuffed Shells Baked Pasta with Ground Turkey Pumpkin Pesto Pasta Lemon Ricotta Pasta Shrimp Arrabiata Pasta Shrimp and Garlic Pasta Roasted Red Pepper Pasta
If you’ve tried this healthy-ish feel good Baked Feta Pasta recipe or any other recipe on FeelGoodFoodie, then don’t forget to rate the recipe and leave me a comment below! I would love to hear about your experience making it. And if you snapped some shots of it, share it with me on
Baked Feta Pasta
Video
Ingredients
- 8 ounces cavatappi pasta or pasta of choice
- 2 pints cherry tomatoes
- 8 ounce block feta cheese
- ½ cup
extra virgin olive oil
- ¼ teaspoon
salt
- ¼ teaspoon
black pepper
- 2 garlic cloves minced
- ¼ cup packed chopped fresh basil plus more for serving
Instructions
- Preheat oven to 400°F. Place the cherry tomatoes in an oven-safe baking dish. Pour the olive oil on top, and season with salt and pepper. Toss until well combined.
- Place the feta block in the middle of the baking dish surrounded by the cherry tomatoes, and flip a couple times to coat it with the olive oil and seasoning.
- Bake in the preheated oven for 35 minutes, until the cherry tomatoes burst, and the feta cheese melts.
- While the tomatoes and feta are baking, cook the pasta in a pot of salted water according to package instructions until al dente. Drain, reserving ½ cup of the cooking liquid in case you'd like to toss it in.
- Immediately add the garlic and basil leaves to the cooked tomatoes and feta and toss everything to combine.
- Transfer the cooked pasta to the baking dish and toss to combine. Garnish with more fresh basil and serve warm.
Notes
Grilled Cheese Social, and this is based on her version. Storage: Store any leftovers in an airtight container. They will last about 3-4 days in the fridge. Substitutes: For best results, follow the recipe as is. However here are some common substitutes that would work well in this recipe.
- Instead of cavatappi pasta, you can use any pasta or make it with gluten-free pasta
- Instead of cherry tomatoes, you can use regular whole tomatoes or even canned diced tomatoes, but cherry tomatoes have the best flavor here.
Nutrition
Nutrition information provided is an estimate. It will vary based on cooking method and specific ingredients used.
Vegetarian Mediterranean

author: Brandon Waltens
title: Texas Strike Force Campaigns for Trump in Battleground of Wisconsin
text: With all eyes on the swing states that are set to decide the fate of the presidential election, a group of Texans recently traveled to Wisconsin to campaign for President Donald Trump. The Texas Strike Force, a volunteer organization working in coordination with the Republican Party and conservative groups, set up shop for a week in Milwaukee, determined to rally support for Trump. Dwayne Collins, who led the delegation of 16, said the group knocked on doors in the “belly of the beast.” “What we see when people come by and honk and thumbs up or give us a hug, what you see are the working men. Plumbers, electricians, truckers. The working people are Trumpers. We’re trying to get that group to the polls,” said Collins. This isn’t the first time the Texas Strike Force has left the Lone Star State to rally support for conservative candidates. Over the past 12 years, the group has campaigned for candidates up and down the ballot in states like Wisconsin, Louisiana, Iowa, and Georgia. The group is a segment of the Mighty American Strike Force, which consists of thousands of volunteers across the country. “A lot of times we work with the Republican parties in the various areas. This time we’re working with Charlie Kirk’s Turning Point Action,” said Collins. “And their goal is for each one of us to get 100 people and follow them up, make sure they get to the vote, get to the polls and vote. And of course, we’re doing more than 100 since we’ve been here for a week.” The response when voters find out they traveled all the way from Texas? “When we tell them we’re from Texas, they tend to want to listen to what we have to say. And of course, we point out the attributes of Trump. And of course, being from Texas, the one thing we mention is the illegal immigration situation that we’re dealing with. It really hits us in Texas,” said Collins.

organizations.name: Texas Strike Force Campaigns for Trump

author: Отдел информации
title: Трамп назвал конфликт России и Украины сражением беспилотников
text:
12 июня, 10:20 Трамп назвал конфликт России и Украины сражением беспилотников Президент США Дональд Трамп на примере конфликта между Россией и Украиной указал на значимое влияние беспилотников на образ современной войны. Об этом он заявил в эфире подкаста Pod Force Onе. "Если посмотреть на эту ужасную войну между Россией и Украиной, которую мы пытаемся остановить, то увидите, что это – война беспилотников", — сказал он. Трамп добавил, что дроны оказали себя как быстрые и умные системы, и еще три года назад никто и представить не мог, что они станут столь влиятельными на поле боя. "Кто бы мог подумать, что беспилотник окажется столь мощным оружием! Но он заменяет множество других видов вооружений, даже самолеты", — отметил президент США. На прошлой неделе президент России Владимир Путин назвал российские беспилотные системы в отдельных сегментах самыми передовыми в мире, иностранцы часто их копируют, пишут РИА Новости.
